name: uncoded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not written, sent, or stored in code (= a system used to represent a message or information in secret form): Many companies still leave sensitive information uncoded. The system does not have direct access to the original uncoded message.
More examplesFewer examplesThis work has introduced a method of efficiently analyzing un-coded data. These uncoded transcripts were given to an independent coder. Later, communications began to be purposefully sent uncoded. The uncoded and open semiotic of the visual image is apparent here.
